backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features (Coming Soon page and dark/amber visual theme) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line descriptions of the three main frontend source files: App.tsx, index.css, and tailwind.config.js.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining light and dark OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for the shadcn-ui design system, including colors, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Coming Soon Page' that mounts the React app via a root div and loads main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering a dark-themed 'Coming Soon' landing page with animated hammer icon, fade-in heading with animated dots, ambient glow orbs, feature hint cards, and a branded footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and context provider that manages Internet Identity authentication state, exposing login/logout functions and status flags via an AuthClient wrapper.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Syne and Inter fonts, defining dark OKLCH design tokens with amber/gold and teal accents, custom utility classes, and keyframe animations for hammer-swing, ping, fade-up, and shimmer effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with Syne/Inter/mono font families, OKLCH-based color tokens, amber glow box-shadow, additional border-radius steps, and custom keyframe animations mapped to utility classes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for a 'Coming Soon' landing page with two features: building the page and applying a bold dark/amber modern theme. No new feature requests or known issues.
